abstract: Michael S. Dell, the founder of Dell Inc., has raised his takeover bid for the computer company by 10 cents, to $13.75 a share, but a special committee of Dell directors indicated it would like $14 a share. A shareholder vote has been moved for a second time, to Aug. 2.

headline.main: Dell Founder Raises Takeover Bid, With Conditions
headline.print_headline: Dell Founder Raises Takeover Bid, With Conditions

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
